question:
Which of the following are the functions performed by Election Commission of India?
1. Grant recognition to political parties and allot election symbols to them.
2. Appoint officers for inquiring into disputes relating to electoral arrangements.
3. Cancel polls in the event of rigging, booth capturing, violence and other irregularities.
explanation: Some of the functions performed by Election Commission of India are: (1) granting recognition to political parties and allot election symbols to them, (2) appointing officers for inquiring into disputes relating to electoral arrangements, (3) canceling polls in the event of rigging, booth capturing, violence and other irregularities etc.
